name: Back in Prehistory
description:
Back in Prehistory is an exciting adventure game where you take on the role of a character who stumbles upon a time machine while exploring prehistoric times.

The goal of the game is to help the character find their way out of this dangerous era while fending off attacks from various prehistoric creatures. The prehistoric environment is filled with dangerous creatures such as dinosaurs, saber-toothed and other deadly predators. You must use your wits and weapons to fend off these creatures and protect yourself from harm. One of the key gameplay mechanics in Back in Prehistory is the concept of attack as the best defense.

You'll need to be quick on your feet and use your weapons wisely to take down the creatures before they have a chance to attack you. Overall, Back in Prehistory is an action-packed adventure game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. With challenging gameplay, stunning visuals, and immersive sound effects, it's a must-play for fans of adventure and action games.

Game features :
- 2 Attacking modes ( bones /stones)
- Deadly predators
- Collecting eggs
